name: 005: "Summoning, Interrupted" or "How the Followers of The Dead God Became Food for Worms"
description:
press the CIRCLE button to access the menu and change the visualization

CONTROLS:
change top level menu          - LEFT arrow button
change top level menu VALUE    - RIGHT arrow button
change setting parameter       - CROSS button
change setting parameter VALUE - UP arrow and DOWN arrow buttons


TO SAVE A LOOPING GIF:
The timing settings let you save looping gifs of any length (up to 16s). When ready, change the `gif_record` setting (under Timing) to true. This will reset the loop, clear the display, disable the menu, and start recording. When it's finished a little popup will appear with your gif. You can then right-click and save that popup gif.

find me on twitter @aebrer for more info

This software is provided "as is", with no warranties or guarantees. It is a snapshot of a WIP visualization engine that I am creating on the Pico-8 fantasy console, for my own personal use. I hope you enjoy exploring with it as much as I do.
